meanings.definition: The act of expelling waste gases from an engine.
meanings.sent1: The avgasses from the car smelled bad.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic checked the avgasses coming out of the engine.

meanings.definition: To release waste gases from a vehicle's exhaust system.
